title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 213.8 - Oral argument
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 213.8 - Oral argument

State Regulations

If a party desires to argue orally before the board, a
written request with reasons therefor shall accompany the exceptions, the
response thereto, or the cross-exceptions and be prominently displayed on the
first page of the party's papers. The board may grant such a request; it may
also direct oral argument on its own motion. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
213.8

Adopted

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
